name: OBS Websocket Advanced
description:
Advanced Module to control OBS by Websocket. Learn more: https://github.com/KopiasCsaba/Chataigne-Module-OBS-Websocket-Advanced 
This module is based on Edrig's awesome work: https://github.com/Edrig/OBS-Websocket-Chataigne-Module

realm.description: Required: The data realm to select. `OBS_WEBSOCKET_DATA_REALM_GLOBAL` or `OBS_WEBSOCKET_DATA_REALM_PROFILE`

slotName.description: Required: The name of the slot to retrieve data from

realm.description: Required: The data realm to select. `OBS_WEBSOCKET_DATA_REALM_GLOBAL` or `OBS_WEBSOCKET_DATA_REALM_PROFILE`

slotName.description: Required: The name of the slot to retrieve data from

slotValue.description: Required: The value to apply to the slot

sceneCollectionName.description: Required: Name of the scene collection to switch to

profileName.description: Required: Name of the profile to switch to
Required: Name for the new profile
Required: Name of the profile to remove

parameterCategory.description: Required: Category of the parameter to get

parameterName.description: Required: Name of the parameter to get

parameterCategory.description: Required: Category of the parameter to set

parameterName.description: Required: Name of the parameter to set

parameterValue.description: Required: Value of the parameter to set. Use `null` to delete

filterIndex.description: Required: New index position of the filter

filterEnabled.description: Required: New enable state of the filter

eventData.description: Required: Data payload to emit to all receivers

vendorName.description: Required: Name of the vendor to use

requestType.description: Required: The request type to call

hotkeyName.description: Required: Name of the hotkey to trigger

inputName.description: Required: Name of the new input to created

inputKind.description: Required: The kind of input to be created

newInputName.description: Required: New name for the input

inputKind.description: Required: Input kind to get the default settings for

inputSettings.description: Required: Object of settings to apply

inputMuted.description: Required: Whether to mute the input or not

inputAudioSyncOffset.description: Required: New audio sync offset in milliseconds

propertyName.description: Required: Name of the list property to get the items of
Required: Name of the button property to press
